New Records: CJ McCollum tied an NBA record with 50 points and 10+ three-pointers in less than 35 minutes, joining Steph Curry and Klay Thompson
Key Match Events: The New Orleans Pelicans ended their 11-game losing streak with a 132-120 victory over the Washington Wizards
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum reflected on his career night and the challenges the Pelicans have faced due to injuries
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans' injuries to Brandon Ingram and Zion Williamson have impacted their performance this season
